dict.string:
Imports an image from a location on your local machine. By default, this patch will keep a copy of that image in the composition in case the original is moved or deleted.
Origami http://origami.facebook.com/
Use of this patch is subject to the license found at http://origami.facebook.com/license/
Copyright: (c) 2014-2015, Facebook, Inc. All rights reserved.
Created by: Austin Bales, Mike Matas
A relative or absolute path to the image you're importing.
The image referenced by the patch.
